<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Enables parts of the AI behavior that was disabled by [[disableAI]]. 
<br><br>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Important </title><part><name index="1"/><value>When player switches and leaves behind AI unit, you need to enable "TeamSwitch" AI on it <tt>_unit [[enableAI]] "TeamSwitch"</tt> so that the unit continues with [[waypoints]] </value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature Arma3 </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Since Arma 3 v1.95.145843 it is possible to return the state of the given AI flag via [[checkAIFeature]] or set it using alias command [[enableAIFeature]]</value></part></template></value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''enableAI''' skilltype </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> skilltype: [[String]] - See [[disableAI]] for possible values. </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_soldierOne [[enableAI]] "Move";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[disableAI]], [[checkAIFeature]], [[enableAIFeature]], [[vehicleMoveInfo]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
